Meet me

WHO AM I ?

Well this is AYUSH ANAND. FIrst, to let you know I wrote my first line of code at the age of 10! And now before I can pass out my School I am already a full-stack Developer.

You may haven't heard this name but I am a student (still in School) to empower all Netizens with the Ideas I possess. My AIM is to develop a World Wide Web that is more safer and is more User-Friendly and not Data Leak Friendly. In the Recent span of time there were various scandals that came to light be it Facebook level or Wannacry Ransomware! We would have forgotten many of them but we shall not... Let's keep our cyber data more safer than even our physical one... Because Digital is here to stay.

You can follow me on my Wordpress blog to catch up on the latest news and my experince on developing my first WebApp. Here.
